languages.text: "Я скорблю, что их доброта не прошла испытание, дарованное им пустотой. Пусть же их гибель станет напоминанием нам — грех многолик, и разложение его способно поразить даже чистейшие души. Благодарю за весть, Лорд-капитан. Колония АIII-649-Минорис официально признана падшей и погибшей".

"It grieves me that their kindness failed the test that the void presented them with. Let their deaths serve as a reminder to us — corruption has many faces and can stain even the purest of souls. Thank you for the news, Lord Captain. Colony AIII-649-Minoris is hereby officially declared fallen and lost."
languages.original_text: "Я скорблю, что их доброта не прошла испытание, дарованное им пустотой. Пусть же их гибель станет напоминанием нам — грех многолик, и разложение его способно поразить даже чистейшие души. Благодарю за весть, Лорд-капитан. Колония АIII-649-Минорис официально признана падшей и погибшей".

traits.locale_text: "I grieve that their kindness failed the test that the void presented them with. Let their deaths serve as a reminder to us — sin has many faces, and its corruption can stain even the purest of souls. Thank you for the news, Lord Captain. Colony AIII-649-Minoris is hereby officially declared fallen and lost."

"I grieve that their kindness failed the test that the void presented them with. Let their deaths serve as a reminder to us — sin has many faces, and its corruption can stain even the purest of souls. Thank you for the news, Lord Captain. Colony AIII-649-Minoris is hereby officially declared fallen and lost."

"It grieves me that their kindness failed the test that the void presented them with. Let their deaths serve as a reminder to us — sin has many faces, and its corruption can stain even the purest of souls. Thank you for the news, Lord Captain. Colony AIII-649-Minoris is hereby officially declared fallen and lost."

"It grieves me that their kindness failed the test that the void presented them with. Let their deaths serve as a reminder to us — sin has many faces, and its corruption can stain even the purest of souls. Thank you for the news, Lord Captain. Colony AIII-649-Minoris is hereby officially declared fallen and lost."

"It grieves me that their kindness failed the test that the void presented them with. Let their deaths serve as a reminder to us — corruption has many faces and can stain even the purest of souls. Thank you for the news, Lord Captain. Colony AIII-649-Minoris is hereby officially declared fallen and lost."

languages.text: “我很难过，他们的仁慈没能帮助他们通过虚空的考验。让他们的死亡成为敲响的警钟吧。腐化有许多张面孔，甚至足以玷污最纯洁的灵魂。谢谢你带来这个消息，领主舰长。我在此正式宣布，AIII-649号小型殖民地已经彻底陷落。”
languages.original_text: "It grieves me that their kindness failed the test that the void presented them with. Let their deaths serve as a reminder to us — corruption has many faces and can stain even the purest of souls. Thank you for the news, Lord Captain. Colony AIII-649-Minoris is hereby officially declared fallen and lost."

traits.locale_text: “我很难过，他们的仁慈没能帮助他们通过虚空的考验。让他们的死亡成为敲响的警钟吧——罪恶有许多面孔，它的腐化甚至足以玷污最纯洁的灵魂。谢谢你带来这个消息，领主舰长。我在此正式宣布，AIII-649号小型殖民地已经彻底陷落。”

languages.text: «Me apena que su bondad no superara la prueba que el vacío les presentó. Sirvan sus muertes como recordatorio de que la corrupción tiene muchas caras y de que mancilla incluso el alma más pura. Gracias por informarme, Lord Capitán. Por la presente, la Colonia AIII-649-Minoris se declara oficialmente caída y perdida».
languages.original_text: "It grieves me that their kindness failed the test that the void presented them with. Let their deaths serve as a reminder to us — corruption has many faces and can stain even the purest of souls. Thank you for the news, Lord Captain. Colony AIII-649-Minoris is hereby officially declared fallen and lost."

traits.locale_text: «Me apena que su bondad no superara la prueba que el vacío les presentó. Sirvan sus muertes como recordatorio de que el pecado tiene muchas caras y de que su corrupción mancilla incluso el alma más pura. Gracias por informarme, Lord Capitán. Por la presente, la Colonia AIII-649-Minoris se declara oficialmente caída y perdida».

languages.text: 「彼らの優しさが、虚空が彼らに与えた試練に折れたことを悲しく思います。罪にはさまざまな顔があり、その腐敗はもっとも純粋な魂をも穢すのだと、彼らの死を教訓にしましょう。ご報告いただきありがとう、ロード・キャプテン。コロニー AIII-649-ミノリスは正式に陥落し、失われたとここに宣言します」
languages.original_text: "It grieves me that their kindness failed the test that the void presented them with. Let their deaths serve as a reminder to us — corruption has many faces and can stain even the purest of souls. Thank you for the news, Lord Captain. Colony AIII-649-Minoris is hereby officially declared fallen and lost."

traits.locale_text: 「彼らの優しさが、虚空が彼らに与えた試練に折れたことを悲しく思います。罪にはさまざまな顔があり、その腐敗はもっとも純粋な魂をも穢すのだと、彼らの死を教訓にしましょう。ご報告いただきありがとう、ロード・キャプテン。コロニー AIII-649-ミノリスは正式に陥落し、失われたとここに宣言します」

languages.text: "Es betrübt mich, dass ihre Güte die Prüfung der Leere nicht bestanden hat. Ihr Tod soll uns eine Warnung sein – die Verderbnis hat viele Gesichter und kann selbst die reinsten Seelen beflecken. Danke für die Mitteilung, Lord Captain. Die Kolonie AIII-649-Minoris wird hiermit offiziell für gefallen und verloren erklärt."
languages.original_text: "It grieves me that their kindness failed the test that the void presented them with. Let their deaths serve as a reminder to us — corruption has many faces and can stain even the purest of souls. Thank you for the news, Lord Captain. Colony AIII-649-Minoris is hereby officially declared fallen and lost."

traits.locale_text: "Es betrübt mich, dass ihre Güte die Prüfung der Leere nicht bestanden hat. Ihr Tod soll uns eine Warnung sein – die Sünde hat viele Gesichter, und ihre Korruption kann selbst die reinsten Seelen beflecken. Danke für die Mitteilung, Lord Captain. Die Kolonie AIII-649-Minoris wird hiermit offiziell für gefallen und verloren erklärt."

languages.text: « Je suis bien triste d'apprendre que leur bonté n'aura pas suffi à surmonter l'épreuve du néant. Puisse leur mort à jamais nous rappeler que la corruption a de nombreux visages et peut même s'emparer des âmes les plus pures. Merci de m'en avoir informé, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je déclare donc la colonie AIII 649-Minoris officiellement perdue. »
languages.original_text: "It grieves me that their kindness failed the test that the void presented them with. Let their deaths serve as a reminder to us — corruption has many faces and can stain even the purest of souls. Thank you for the news, Lord Captain. Colony AIII-649-Minoris is hereby officially declared fallen and lost."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis bien triste d'apprendre que leur bonté n'aura pas suffi à surmonter l'épreuve du néant. Puisse leur mort à jamais nous rappeler que le péché a de nombreux visages et peut corrompre même les âmes les plus pures. Merci de m'en avoir informé, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je déclare donc la colonie AIII 649-Minoris officiellement perdue. »

languages.text: "İçlerindeki iyilik, uçsuzun karşılarına çıkardığı sınavda galip gelmeye yetmediği için üzgünüm. Ölümleri bize yozluğun birçok sureti olduğunun ve en saf ruhları bile kirletebileceğinin hatırlatıcısı olsun. Bilgilendirdiğin için teşekkürler Lord Kaptan. Koloni AIII-649-Minoris, bundan böyle resmî olarak düşmüş ve kaybedilmiş kabul edilecek."
languages.original_text: "It grieves me that their kindness failed the test that the void presented them with. Let their deaths serve as a reminder to us — corruption has many faces and can stain even the purest of souls. Thank you for the news, Lord Captain. Colony AIII-649-Minoris is hereby officially declared fallen and lost."

traits.locale_text: "İçlerindeki iyilik, uçsuzun karşılarına çıkardığı sınavda galip gelmek için yeterli olmadığı için üzgünüm. Ölümleri bize yozlaşmanın birçok sureti olduğunun ve en saf ruhları bile kirletebileceğinin bir hatırlatıcısı olsun. Bilgilendirdiğin için teşekkürler Lord Kaptan. Koloni AIII-649-Minoris bundan böyle resmî olarak düşmüş ve kaybedilmiş kabul edilecek."
